entry.title: Paris Tack All Purpose English Saddle Cover with Fleece Lining
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: Saddle Carry Bags & Sets
Price: 18.95

This saddle cover fits most All Purpose English saddles. Complimented with fleece lining for extra protection.

  • Fits most all purpose and forward flap saddles
  • Made from quality nylon for durability
  • Fleece lining for extra protection against scratches
  • Great for protecting and transporting your investment!

This 4 item set is great for protecting and transporting show equipment. This set has a bag specially designed for every piece of your equipment and enough extra pockets for all your accessories. Quality nylon outer shell, with inner padding and smooth nylon lining keeps your tack clean and protected during travel. Rated as our Best Gift Set for English Rider!
  • English AP Saddle Carry Bag. Nylon with foam Padding & Nylon Lining 3 Layers.
  • English Long Boot Carry Bag. Nylon with foam Padding & Nylon Lining 3 Layers.

  • Waterproof
  • Premium Garment Carry Bag Nylon.

entry.title: Derby All Purpose Nylon English Saddle Cover with Fleece Lining - Protects Saddles from Dust, Debris & Damage - Fits Most Sizes and Styles of Saddles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: English Carry Bags & Covers
Price: 17.95

This saddle cover features a classic, attractive design while keeping your saddle safe and protected from dust and debris, wear, and damage. The stretchable, generous design allows it to fit almost any saddle.

  • ATTRACTIVE DESIGN - this high-quality saddle cover has a chic, classic English look to it and features our logo “Paris Tack: French Design” and the Eiffel tower embroidered in gold on the right-hand side.
  • PROTECTS YOUR SADDLE - this cover protects your saddle from dust and debris as well as from being scratched or otherwise damaged and is an attractive way to protect your saddle.
  • FLEECE LINED - this saddle cover is fleece lined to add extra cushion and protect your saddle during transport and storage.
  • MULTIPLE COLORS - this saddle cover is available in two colors, Black or Navy Blue.
  • FITS MOST SADDLES - this all-purpose cover is stretchable and sized generously and is designed to accommodate almost any all purpose English saddle. A separate design is available for dressage saddles.

entry.title: Paris Premium Embroidered Nylon Dressage English Saddle Cover - Fits Most Sizes and Styles of English Saddles - Multiple Colors Available
entry.summary:
Vendor: Paris Tack
Type: English Carry Bags & Covers
Price: 14.95

This saddle cover features a classic, attractive design while keeping your saddle safe and protected from dust and debris, wear, and damage. The stretchable, generous design allows it to fit almost any saddle.

  • NYLON CONSTRUCTION - this saddle cover is made of a thin, stretchable nylon material that allows your entire saddle to be covered and protected without it looking bulky or ugly.
  • ATTRACTIVE DESIGN - this high-quality saddle cover has a chic, classic English look to it and features our logo “Paris Tack: French Design” and the Eiffel tower embroidered in gold on the right-hand side.
  • PROTECTS YOUR SADDLE - this cover protects your saddle from dust and debris as well as from being scratched or otherwise damaged and is an attractive way to protect your saddle.
  • MULTIPLE COLORS - this saddle pad is available in Black and Navy Blue, both with gold trim.
  • FITS MOST SADDLES - this dressage cover is stretchable and sized generously and is designed to accommodate almost any dressage English saddle. A separate design is available for all-purpose saddles.
